sentences.en: Every merchant, manufacturer, broker, or tradesman who gives a customer time to pay is really loaning his customer the money.
sentences.cn: 商人、制造商、经纪人或零售商如果给客户的支付留出了一定的时间，实际上就是在向客户提供信贷。

sentences.en: Every tradesman ought to read the contract carefully before he strikes hands with a stranger.
sentences.cn: 每个商人在与陌生人达成协议之前都应细读合同.

sentences.en: In the seventeenth and eighteenth centuries there arose a prosperous tradesman class.
sentences.cn: 在十七和十八世纪,兴起了繁荣的商人阶级.

sentences.en: International company in Beijing Financial Street District has immediate need for an experienced Tradesman, Mechanical.
sentences.cn: 坐落于北京金融街的卓著中心即将开业, 急需招一名有经验的机械维修技工.

sentences.en: It would be against all my principles to deal with a tradesman who goes to chapel.
sentences.cn: 同到小教堂去的商人打交道是违背我的一切原则的.

sentences.en: Jerry, you honest tradesman, it wouldn't suit your line of business!
sentences.cn: 杰瑞, 你是个诚实的生意人, 这对你的业务可是不利!

sentences.en: Local tradesmen are objecting to plans for a big new out-of-town shopping centre.
sentences.cn: 当地的店主们反对在城郊新建大型购物中心的计划。

sentences.en: Many of the tourists on board had begun bargaining with the tradesman.
sentences.cn: 船上的很多旅客开始与商人讨价还价了.

sentences.en: Officers and tradesman are there to implore the gods to bless the voyage of Hamilcar.
sentences.cn: 官员和商人在那里求神保佑哈米尔卡一路平安.

sentences.en: She owed money to every tradesman in the town.
sentences.cn: 她欠镇上所有店主的钱.

sentences.en: The Excel Centre in the Beijing Financial Street District has immediate opening for a Tradesman, Maintenance.
sentences.cn: 坐落于北京金融街的卓著中心即将开业, 急需一名综合维修工.

sentences.en: The tradesman balanced his losses against his profits.
sentences.cn: 那商人把他的亏损跟赢利相抵.

sentences.en: The tradesman has rendered his account.
sentences.cn: 这商人已经开出他的帐目.

sentences.en: The tradesman was poring over his accounts.
sentences.cn: 那位商人正在仔细查看他的账目.

sentences.en: The tradesman was vigorously soliciting for my custom.
sentences.cn: 那个店主极力向我拉生意.

sentences.en: This is a job for a skilled tradesman.
sentences.cn: 这是娴熟的工匠才能干的活儿.

sentences.en: Tool organizers, pouches and holders for all types of tools, designed for the tradesman.
sentences.cn: 为工具的所有类型的工具组织者, 小袋和持有者, 为商人设计了.

words.tran_cn: [贸易]商人；（英）店主；零售商；手艺人

trans.tran_cn: 商人，店主，零售商，手艺人
trans.tran_en: someone who buys and sells goods or services, especially in a shop
